channel.title: TGRoss
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGRoss, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Hedge Funds are Selling
item.description: Hey, Ross Givens here! Hedge funds just flipped from net buyers to net sellers—before the tariff announcement even hit. This shift could spark a broad...

item.title: Prepare for a Pullback
item.description: Hey, Ross Givens here! Markets are set to open deep in the red—S&P 500 futures down 2%, Nasdaq 100 down 2.65%, and Russell 2000 down 3%. Trump’s polic...

item.title: Did They See Nvidia’s Drop Coming?
item.description: Hey, Ross Givens here! Nvidia is down over 15% from its recent highs, with DeepSeek as the latest catalyst. But let’s be real—this pullback was brewin...

item.title: Market Participation is Holding Up
item.description: Hey, Ross Givens here! Market participation is surging. Just a week ago, only 27% of stocks traded above their 50-day moving averages—now, that number...

item.title: Reminder – We are Not Index Investors
item.description: Hey, Ross Givens here! Monday’s 1.5% drop in the S&P 500 looked rough at first glance—but beneath the surface, something unusual happened. Despite the...
